sentences.en: " Aunt, you don't whack Sid when he takes it. "
sentences.cn: “ 姨妈,希德拿糖吃, 您怎么不打他呀. ”

sentences.en: After years of dieting, Carol's metabolism was completely out of whack.
sentences.cn: 经过数年的节食, 卡罗尔的新陈代谢完全紊乱了.

sentences.en: all their calculations were out of whack.
Don't bother trying to call me on my mobile . It's out of whack again.
sentences.cn: 不要打我的手机,它又出问题了.

sentences.en: Have you all had a fair whack?
sentences.cn: 你们是不是都得到了公平的一份了?

sentences.en: Have you all had your whack?
sentences.cn: 你们得到了你们的一份了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He gave me a whack on the back to wake me up.
sentences.cn: 他为把我弄醒,在我背上猛拍一下.

sentences.en: He gave the donkey a whack across the back with his stick.
sentences.cn: 他拿棍子朝驴背上狠狠打了一下。

sentences.en: He took his ax and struck the trunk of the tree. Whack. Whack. Whack.
sentences.cn: 他举起斧子砍树干，咔，咔，咔。

sentences.en: I have had my whack of pleasure.
sentences.cn: 我也得到了一份愉快〔分享到愉快〕.

sentences.en: the car has a top whack of 107 mph.
sentences.cn: 这部车最高时速为107英里。

sentences.en: The ecosystem will be thrown out of whack.
sentences.cn: 生态系统将会失去平衡。

sentences.en: The majority of people in this country pay their whack.
sentences.cn: 该国大部分人尽了他们的一份力。

sentences.en: They have all had a whack.
sentences.cn: 他们大家都分到了一份.

sentences.en: We need to win a fair whack of the contracts.
sentences.cn: 我们需要赢得这些合同中的相当大的份额。

sentences.en: You really have to whack the ball.
sentences.cn: 你真的需要猛击球才行。

words.tran_cn: 疲惫不堪的，精疲力竭的
重击的人；异常巨大的东西；弥天大谎

phrases.phrase: have a whack at 或 take a whack at 【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: (主北美，，主澳 )紊乱，次序颠倒；出故障
不正常，有毛病：顺序不对或不平衡，不能正确履行功能
醉了的，中毒的：处于引起意识的改变的药物影响之下的

trans.tran_en: the act of hitting something hard, or the noise this makes
to hit someone or something hard

trans.tran_cn: 重击，使劲打，分配，击败，削减
